steps.description: Go to Plane of Sky and kill the Keeper of Souls to loot the Essence of a Ghost.
Go to Plane of Fear and kill the Dread, Fright, and Terror until you loot the Essence of a Vampire.
Go to Plane of Hate and kill the Maestro of Rancor to loot the Essence of a Shadow.
Go to Kithicor Forest and kill General V`ghera to loot the Essence of a Phantom.
Go to East Freeport and find Arantir Karondor. Give him Essence of a Ghost, Essence of a Vampire, Essence of a Shadow, and Essence of a Phantom to receive Staff of the Four.
